original_title: 潜入捜査官、堕ちるまで… 被験体・コードネームサクラ
overview: Illegal transactions, money laundering, tax evasion ... 202X. Authorities have set up a secret investigative body to combat the growing organized crime. Undercover investigators are allowed to infiltrate by their own will. … But that responsibility was also taken. There is no support from the authorities, even if they are captured by the enemy and criminalized. That is the fate of undercover investigators.
title: An Undercover Investigation, That Will Never End Until You Obey… The Subject: Codename: Sakura Minami Shiratori
